title: [RG.REBOOT] Pacific Rim (English) {CAM REPACK}
description:
Movie Notes 
~~~~~~~~~~~
As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee 
are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the 
world from the apocalypse.


Repack Notes
~~~~~~~~~
REPACKED from the following two sources:

Video: http://kickass.to/pacific-rim-2013-ita-md-telesync-x264-ravers-t7614818.html
Audio: http://kickass.to/pacific-rim-english-cam-audio-only-moviesounds123-mp3-t7615654.html


NO WATERMARKS

Also, please don't steal. This took me a long time to sync, so, give credit where needed <3


A SPECIAL MESSAGE FROM REBOOT.OP!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
To any releasers and/or suppliers out there, or perhaps even rippers, we need your help!

RG.REBOOT is a new release group on the scene, run by a veteran ripper, whom would like to
start their own release group.

Below are sections that need members:
- Rippers
- Suppliers
- Initial Seeders/Seedboxes
- Theatrical Filmers
- ASCII Artists

If you are at all interested in joining our ranks, please don't fear to pop an e-mail to:
